      • addProductToOrder

        public void addProductToOrder(int index1,
                              int index2,
                              int orderNumber)
                       throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Method adding product to an order
        pre: Order has been selected
        post: Adds product to order
        Parameters:
        index1, - position in client list of the client that wants to add a product
        index2, - position in order list of the order that the product is being added to
        orderNumber, - number representing the order to be added to
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
        java.io.IOException
